trans-unit.resname: PDCI·42 | Celestine Reef | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Celestine Reef
trans-unit.target: Celestine Reef

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·42 | Celestine Reef | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.
trans-unit.target: Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·42 | Celestine Reef | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, until a player planeswalks, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
trans-unit.target: Whenever chaos ensues, until a player planeswalks, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·43 | Horizon Boughs | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Horizon Boughs
trans-unit.target: Horizon Boughs

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·43 | Horizon Boughs | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All permanents untap during each player's untap step.
trans-unit.target: All permanents untap during each player's untap step.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·43 | Horizon Boughs | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Whenever chaos ensues, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·44 | Mirrored Depths | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mirrored Depths
trans-unit.target: Mirrored Depths

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·44 | Mirrored Depths | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If the player loses the flip, counter that spell.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If the player loses the flip, counter that spell.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·44 | Mirrored Depths | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, target player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: Whenever chaos ensues, target player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·45 | Tember City | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tember City
trans-unit.target: Tember City

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·45 | Tember City | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that player.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that player.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·45 | Tember City | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, each other player sacrifices a nonland permanent.
trans-unit.target: Whenever chaos ensues, each other player sacrifices a nonland permanent.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·54 | Plots That Span Centuries | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plots That Span Centuries
trans-unit.target: Plots That Span Centuries

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·54 | Plots That Span Centuries | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, the next time you would set a scheme in motion, set three schemes in motion instead.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, the next time you would set a scheme in motion, set three schemes in motion instead.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·55 | Perhaps You've Met My Cohort | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Perhaps You've Met My Cohort
trans-unit.target: Perhaps You've Met My Cohort

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·55 | Perhaps You've Met My Cohort | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·56 | Your Inescapable Doom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Your Inescapable Doom
trans-unit.target: Your Inescapable Doom

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·56 | Your Inescapable Doom | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up.)
trans-unit.target: (An ongoing scheme remains face up.)

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·56 | Your Inescapable Doom | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, put a doom counter on this scheme, then this scheme deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to the opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, you choose one.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your end step, put a doom counter on this scheme, then this scheme deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to the opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, you choose one.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·57 | Drench the Soil in Their Blood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drench the Soil in Their Blood
trans-unit.target: Drench the Soil in Their Blood

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·57 | Drench the Soil in Their Blood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, after this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, after this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·58 | Imprison This Insolent Wretch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imprison This Insolent Wretch
trans-unit.target: Imprison This Insolent Wretch

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·58 | Imprison This Insolent Wretch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.)
trans-unit.target: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.)

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·58 | Imprison This Insolent Wretch | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·58 | Imprison This Insolent Wretch | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Permanents the chosen player controls don't untap during their untap step.
trans-unit.target: Permanents the chosen player controls don't untap during their untap step.

trans-unit.resname: PDCI·58 | Imprison This Insolent Wretch | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: When the chosen player is attacked or becomes the target of a spell or ability, abandon this scheme.
trans-unit.target: When the chosen player is attacked or becomes the target of a spell or ability, abandon this scheme.
